name: nativescript-ng2-slides
description: Angular Native(NativeScript + Angular 2) version of the slides

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-ng2-slides && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
scripts.ios: xcproj --project platforms/ios/YourApp.xcodeproj touch; xcproj --project platforms/ios/Pods/Pods.xcodeproj touch; tns livesync ios --emulator --watch

author: Josh Sommer <joshdsommer@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/_JoshSommer)
